about_the_game:
Experience the vibrant cartoon inspired soundtrack for the Secret Monster Society. Featuring all tracks found in the game, and will be updated upon each new Chapter release to provide even more fantastic music and value.

Tracks are:

1) Opening Theme
2) Classroom Mayhem
3) Corridor - version 1
4) Basement Blues
5) School's on Fire
6) Forbidden Forest
7) Corridor - version 2
8) Germ Warfare
9) The Office
10) The Restroom
11) Time Travel
12) Restroom 2 - Reprise
